attributes.action: Prepare United Kingdom for 2012 London Olympic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
God's chosen Lord Prime Minster Tony Blair deserves Fourth term as Prime Minster of United Kingdom to prepare United Kingdom for the 2012 London Olympic. During his third term he also deserves support of his party to achieve the multiculturalisem and community integration project in the United Kingdom nationally and to help the Middle East peace, the Darfur Sudan humanitarian suffering and other global issues internationally.

Christ help Lord Prime Minster Tony Blair
